module.name: Bulk Extensions
module.description: Bulk Extensions uses CSV files to import and export extensions.
module.changelog: *2.12.0.0* Newer GUI, standarize module components *2.11.0.7* Initial Issabel Foundation release *2.5.0.5* Add permit/deny fields provided by 4Colo. Fixed a small bug in table.csv. Fixed spelling error in template.csv. Added localization for table.csv. See CHANGES for how-to. *0.1* First release
